work.title: Software Engineering Manager
work.description: Started as Technical Business Analyst, grew into Front-End Engineer (Tesla Award for Innovation), now VP managing 12 engineers across 2 global squads. Led zero-to-one UI development for financial planning apps. Currently lead engineering strategy for 5 client-facing apps across Morgan Stanley Online & E*TRADE. Pitched and launched a unified planning platform saving $2M+. Now leading firm-wide AI developer enablement & education via bootcamps and workshops. OpenAI Hackathon finalist with 'Nevernote' (Whisper, Langchain, GPT).

work.title: Founder
work.description: Founded mobile app helping food truck owners save time and money. Built end-to-end with Flutter/Firebase for iOS & Android. Developed 'Garnish' AI advisor using OpenAI for menu pricing, permits, and operations guidance. Secured partner discounts with Square, Food Service Direct, and FLIP Insurance. Serving 150+ food trucks nationwide.

work.title: Co-Founder
work.description: Led technical strategy for algorithmic crypto trading platform using Java, React, and AWS. Grew AUM to $750K in 18 months through automated arbitrage trading. Discontinued in 2019 due to market conditions.
